disclaimerPoints.title: 1. Tools For Reference Only
disclaimerPoints.text: Tools on this site are for learning and reference only. No guarantee of accuracy or completeness. Tool outputs do not constitute professional advice.

disclaimerPoints.title: 2. Health & Finance Disclaimer
disclaimerPoints.text: Results from health and finance tools are for reference only and do not constitute medical diagnoses, treatment recommendations, or investment advice. Please consult professionals for related needs.

disclaimerPoints.title: 3. User Responsibility
disclaimerPoints.text: The site assumes no responsibility for any consequences of using these tools. Please verify tool suitability before use.

disclaimerPoints.title: 4. Data Security
disclaimerPoints.text: The site is not responsible for data loss due to network or system failures. We recommend backing up important data before using tools.

disclaimerPoints.title: 5. Open Source Disclaimer
disclaimerPoints.text: This project is released under an open source license. We are not liable for any issues arising from the use, modification, or distribution of the code.

disclaimerPoints.title: 6. Service Changes
disclaimerPoints.text: The site reserves the right to modify, interrupt, or discontinue services without prior notice.
